title: Sardine, watercress and carrot open sandwich
ingredients: ['1 carrot, about 125 g (4½ oz), grated', '30 g (1 oz) watercress, roughly chopped', '2 tbsp chopped fresh chives', '150 g (5½ oz) reduced-fat soft cheese', '8 thick slices rye bread', '2 cans sardines in olive oil, about 120 g each, drained', '1 small red onion, thinly sliced pepper', 'a few long fresh chives to garnish']
